fieldDescription: When a save is loaded all base blueprints are removed from your database.
Default CR for non-automated ships is reduced from 70%% to 50%%.
Adds moons to planets during mapgen or on first load.
Enable all AI tweaks on SD ships. Disable for debug.
Controls whether custom fleet command AI runs for the player fleet.
Controls whether custom fleet command AI runs for enemy AI fleets.
Controls whether the Very High Importance arms dealer knows every blueprint in the entire game.
